languages.text: "Вы не стали закрывать глаза на дерзость, пусть даже она исходила от неразумного юноши. Это говорит о вас как о жестком лидере, Вольный Торговец, не терпящем слабость. Империуму нужны такие, как вы".

traits.locale_text: "Вы не стали закрывать глаза на дерзость, пусть даже она исходила от неразумного юноши. Это говорит о вас как о жестком лидере, Вольный Торговец, не терпящем слабость. Империуму нужны такие, как вы".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "You refused to turn a blind eye to insolence, even when it came from a thoughtless boy. That is a sign of a firm leader, Rogue Trader, one who doesn't tolerate weakness. The Imperium needs people like you."
languages.original_text: "Вы не стали закрывать глаза на дерзость, пусть даже она исходила от неразумного юноши. Это говорит о вас как о жестком лидере, Вольный Торговец, не терпящем слабость. Империуму нужны такие, как вы".

traits.locale_text: "You refused to turn a blind eye to insolence, even if it did come from a senseless boy. That is a sign of a strict leader, Rogue Trader, one who doesn't tolerate weakness. The Imperium needs people like you."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You refused to turn a blind eye to insolence, even if it did come from a senseless boy. That is a sign of a strict leader, Rogue Trader, one who doesn't tolerate weakness. The Imperium needs people like you."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You refused to turn a blind eye to insolence, even when it came from a thoughtless boy. That is a sign of a firm leader, Rogue Trader, one who doesn't tolerate weakness. The Imperium needs people like you."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You refused to turn a blind eye to insolence, even when it came from a thoughtless boy. That is a sign of a firm leader, Rogue Trader, one who doesn't tolerate weakness. The Imperium needs people like you."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You refused to turn a blind eye to insolence, even when it came from a thoughtless boy. That is a sign of a firm leader, Rogue Trader, one who doesn't tolerate weakness. The Imperium needs people like you."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “哪怕那仅仅是个思维不成熟的孩子，你也并没有对他的无礼行为视而不见。你是个毫不容忍软弱的人，行商浪人，这正是坚定领袖的标志。帝国需要你这样的人。”
languages.original_text: "You refused to turn a blind eye to insolence, even when it came from a thoughtless boy. That is a sign of a firm leader, Rogue Trader, one who doesn't tolerate weakness. The Imperium needs people like you."

traits.locale_text: “哪怕那仅仅是个思维不成熟的孩子，你也并没有对他的无礼行为视而不见。你是个毫不容忍软弱的人，行商浪人，这正是坚定领袖的标志。帝国需要你这样的人。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Se negó a hacer la vista gorda a la insolencia, aunque viniera de un joven atolondrado. Eso es lo que denota a un líder firme, Comerciante Independiente, alguien que no tolera la debilidad. El Imperium necesita a más gente como usted».
languages.original_text: "You refused to turn a blind eye to insolence, even when it came from a thoughtless boy. That is a sign of a firm leader, Rogue Trader, one who doesn't tolerate weakness. The Imperium needs people like you."

traits.locale_text: «Se negó a hacer la vista gorda a la insolencia, aunque viniera de un joven atolondrado. Eso es lo que denota a un líder firme, Comerciante Independiente, alguien que no tolera la debilidad. El Imperium necesita a más gente como usted».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「無思慮な少年からの告発にあっても、陛下は見て見ぬふりをしなかった。それがリーダーの証だ、自由開拓者。弱さを許さない者であるという印。帝国には、御身のような人物が必要なのです」
languages.original_text: "You refused to turn a blind eye to insolence, even when it came from a thoughtless boy. That is a sign of a firm leader, Rogue Trader, one who doesn't tolerate weakness. The Imperium needs people like you."

traits.locale_text: 「無思慮な少年からの告発にあっても、陛下は見て見ぬふりをしなかった。それがリーダーの証だ、自由開拓者。弱さを許さない者であるという印。帝国には、御身のような人物が必要なのです」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt seine Aufsässigkeit nicht ignoriert, obwohl er nur ein gedankenloser Junge war. So etwas zeichnet {mf|einen starken Anführer aus, Freihändler, einen, der|eine starke Anführerin aus, Freihändlerin, eine, die} Schwäche nicht toleriert. Das Imperium braucht Menschen wie Euch."
languages.original_text: "You refused to turn a blind eye to insolence, even when it came from a thoughtless boy. That is a sign of a firm leader, Rogue Trader, one who doesn't tolerate weakness. The Imperium needs people like you."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt seine Aufsässigkeit nicht ignoriert, obwohl er nur ein gedankenloser Junge war. So etwas zeichnet {mf|einen starken Anführer aus, Freihändler, einen, der|eine starke Anführerin aus, Freihändlerin, eine, die} Schwäche nicht toleriert. Das Imperium braucht Menschen wie Euch."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez refusé de fermer les yeux sur ce manque de respect, même si le fautif n'était qu'un garçon irréfléchi. C'est la preuve que vous êtes {mf|un|une} chef ferme qui ne tolère pas la faiblesse. L'Imperium a besoin de gens comme vous. »
languages.original_text: "You refused to turn a blind eye to insolence, even when it came from a thoughtless boy. That is a sign of a firm leader, Rogue Trader, one who doesn't tolerate weakness. The Imperium needs people like you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez refusé de fermer les yeux sur ce manque de respect, même si le fautif n'était qu'un garçon irréfléchi. C'est la preuve que vous êtes {mf|un|une} chef ferme qui ne tolère pas la faiblesse. L'Imperium a besoin de gens comme vous. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Patavatsız gencin tekinin küstahlığına meydan bırakmadın. Gerçekten güçlü bir liderin... Zaafları mazur görmeyen bir liderin nasıl olması gerektiğini gösterdin. İmparatorluk'un senin gibi insanlara ihtiyacı var Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "You refused to turn a blind eye to insolence, even when it came from a thoughtless boy. That is a sign of a firm leader, Rogue Trader, one who doesn't tolerate weakness. The Imperium needs people like you."

traits.locale_text: "Patavatsız gencin tekinin küstahlığına meydan bırakmadın. Gerçekten güçlü bir liderin nasıl olması gerektiğini gösterdin. Zaafları mazur görmeyen bir liderin… İmparatorluk'un senin gibi insanlara ihtiyacı var Hür Tacir."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
